title: "Use Loudspeakers For...": Aaditya Thackeray's Dig At Uncle Raj Thackeray - NDTV
content:
1. "Use Loudspeakers For...": Aaditya Thackeray's Dig At Uncle Raj Thackeray  NDTV
  2. Azaan Row Intensifies: MNS Issues Ultimatum To Shiv Sena To Remove Loudspeakers From Mosques  TIMES NOW
  3. 'Instead of removing': What Aaditya Thackeray says on loudspeaker row  Hindustan Times
  4. What Can Law Do To Check Hate? Senior Advocates Share Their Views | News Today With Rajdeep Sardesai  India Today
  5. MNS sees exodus of Muslim leaders from party as Raj Thackeray continues to push for ban on loudspeakers in mos  Times Now
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Maharashtra Minister Aaditya Thackeray on Friday lashed out at Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS) chief Raj Thackeray who threatened to hold protests if loudspeakers were not removed from outside mosques by May 3.
